bibdata.abstract: Recommended Practice for the Instrumentation and Metering of Industrial and Commercial Power Systems.

This recommended practice covers the instrumentation and metering of industrial and commercial powersystems. It describes the importance of metering to achieve a successful energy management process, aswell as considerations that must be made when applying the latest metering technology.
